SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, name, phone, email, auth_type AS authType, auth_openid AS authOpenid, auth_username AS authUsername, auth_nickname AS authNickname, auth_logo AS authLogo, balance, adviser_id AS adviserId, region_id AS regionId from tb_user where auth_type = #{thirdType} and auth_openid = #{thirdId}
